channel.title: Um, Need Help Please
channel.description:
:mad: :confused: PROBLEM :confused: :mad:
Tryed so many time to open the moparscape.bat client, yet only reaches -18% of "game download" before it shuts itself down with no warning, leaving me only with the "running bot" window open with the phrase:
"Press any key to continue"
Which once a key is pressed, that too shuts itself down. The percent of "game download" is also incredibly slow, barely managing to reach -18% in a 30 - 60 min time span. I have tried all day to try and fix whatever problems there have been and this the last and most hardest to resolve as I havn't seen one person with this problem or similar.
I would greatly appreciate any, little or large, advice toward this problem and welcome all suggestions/comments.
:) Thanks :)
:) Hmmph :)

item.title: Um, Need Help Please

Ok its going faster, up to 7% in 5 minutes.
Fingers crossed It’ll work.

item.title: Um, Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip

Save it to the folder C:\WINDOWS.mpr_file_store_32, then extract it.

Read full topic

                               :mad: :confused: PROBLEM :confused: :mad:
